channel.title: A better way to ban?
channel.description:
Ok well my problem is I have added someone's IP to the ban list and it works..sometimes...on the prompt it shows they are banned but when they keep trying to get on it eventually lets them on. There IP is always the same...any ideas?
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 09:32:45 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind. Found it. Sorry.

item.title: A better way to ban?
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

I was talking about an IP ban but users could still get on it was because return 5 was supposed to be disconnected = true as in the tutorial by …someone I forgot…to tiard.

Read full topic
